definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Amorphophallus Campanulatus Powder, Soya Bean Fibre, Starch, Vegetarian Seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 魔芋粉，大豆纤维，淀粉，素食调味料。

sentences.english: Objective To study on the artificial culture technology of Radix stephaniae tetrandra S.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究粉防己野生变家种的技术。

sentences.english: Drying temperature was one of the most important factors that would affect the properties of edible wheat gluten films.
sentences.chinese: 干燥温度是影响谷朊粉可食性膜性能的一个重要因素。

sentences.english: An overlay welding electrode without mineral powder (such as, slagforming medium, etc.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了无造渣剂等矿石粉的耐磨堆焊电焊条。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a wheat germ nutrient flour and its preparation method.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种麦胚营养粉及其制备方法。

sentences.english: Technology of instant arrowhead(Sagittaria sagittrifolia)powder was studied in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了速溶慈姑粉的生产工艺。

sentences.english: They powdered it to prevent further harm.
sentences.chinese: 他们给它抹上粉，防止进一步破坏。

sentences.english: The paper explored the manufacturing process of substitute wollastonite flour for barium sulfide to produce the alkyd putty.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了用硅灰石粉代替硫酸钡制造醇酸腻子。

sentences.english: I bread the fish before I cook it.
sentences.chinese: 我在烹调鱼之前会先把它裹上面包粉。

sentences.english: Season with salt, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin powder and white pepper powder.
sentences.chinese: 用食盐，柠檬汁，孜然粉，橄榄油和胡椒粉调味。

sentences.english: The blast furnace slag is grinded to have the granularity the same as that of the cement.
sentences.chinese: 高炉矿渣粉需要磨细，粒度与水泥粒度相同。

sentences.english: Control of root mealy bugs is accomplished with soil drenches with an insecticide.
sentences.chinese: 根部粉蚧的控制是在土壤喷洒杀虫剂时完成的。

sentences.english: The soluble dietary fiber is the konjac flour or sodium alginate powder.
sentences.chinese: 可溶性膳食纤维为魔芋精粉或海藻酸钠粉。

sentences.english: Mix the sugar and jelly powder for the coconut pudding.
sentences.chinese: 把椰子布丁中的砂糖与果冻粉混合。

sentences.english: Sherbet lemons are hard candies filled with dry sherbet powder.
sentences.chinese: 柠檬果子露其实就是中心填了这种干果子露粉的硬糖。

sentences.english: The rheological properties of cottonseed meal were investigated using a capillary rheometry.
sentences.chinese: 用毛细管流变仪研究了棉籽粉的流变特性。
